page.title: 06 THE JOBS PEOPLE DO
page.content: Our area contains about 30% of the housing in {KILSYTH,}and most people who live in these houses need some sort of{employment}.The area that we have been given is mostly covered by {rough grazing land}so some people work on the farms, but this involves only a few people. The greatest source of employment in our area are the two schools,{KILSYTH ACADEMY and{BALMALLOCH PRIMARY.} Between these two schools, over {100 people are employed.30/40% of these people have to travel to work from out-side the area. Many people may have to travel out side the area to get to their work. Younger people may have part time jobs eg{delivering milk,delivering {papers.etc}.This can also be called a source for EMPLOYMENT.
